review: I use this in my toddlers car seat.  The cup holder is small and doesn't hold much. I bought this for a road trip and use it for lunch and snacks on the go. Great purchase. Not of the best quality materials but is holding up well. Better than most of the alternatives like snack trays and center consoles.
productTitle: Evelots Automobile Swivel Tray Car Truck Food Snacks Electronics Cup Holder
